name: Bunker Game
storyline: Set in an underground bunker sometime after an apocalypse, you play as the human custodian whose job is to make sure all of the bunker's systems remain operational. You wake up one morning to a critical system failure: no more oxygen is being fed into the bunker, and you and your team have only three days of air left. With limited time to solve the problem, you'll have to navigate the bunker looking for a solution, while also engaging in small-talk with Wolf, the one crewmate still active.
summary: A short, post-apocalypse, story-driven point-and-click game about companionship and legacy.
